topic.title: HP Helion 1.3 Development Platform: Quick Start Developer Trial

titlealts.searchtitle: HP Helion 1.3 Development Platform: Quick Start Developer Trial Termination

body.p: When you are done exploring your Developer Quick Start Trial, you can take the environment down just as easily.

stentry.p: To ensure that all your resources are properly released, use the Horizon console.

ol.li: In the Project panel, select Compute and then select Instances.
Click the checkbox next to the instance named cluster1-core.
If you added a Windows DEA node or a SQL Server service, you will have additional instances to delete. The names will all start with cluster1-. Check the checkboxes next to those instances.
In the Project panel, select Compute and then select Access & Security.
Click the checkbox next to the groups named cluster1-SSH, cluster1-Router, and cluster1-Internal.
